name: RetroBot
description: RetroBot is a vintage oscilloscope-themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its retro console box, classic button arms and legs, snake-themed screen, and cool shades as an addon, RetroBot brings a unique blend of nostalgia and modern technology. This robot is not only functional but also stylish, making it a hit among tech enthusiasts and retro gaming aficionados.
